faqs.question: Why wouldn't I just hire a full-time designer?
faqs.answer:
Good question! For starters, the annual cost of a full-time senior-level digital designer or developer now exceeds $100,000, plus benefits (and good luck finding one available). Aside from that, you may not always have enough work to keep them busy at all times, so you're stuck paying for time you aren't able to utilize.


Our subscription model offers flexibility without the obligation of long-term contracts. It operates on a monthly basis, allowing you to pause or cancel anytime. This reduces risk for businesses, providing the freedom to adapt to changing needs without being tied down by lengthy new commitments.

ï»¿

faqs.question: What happens after I subscribe to a plan?
faqs.answer:
After subscribing to a plan, you will receive a unique login that grants you access to your personal portal. This portal allows you to manage your requests and directly communicate with your designer regarding your account.

We will guide you through the onboarding process to ensure you fully understand how to use your portal, manage design requests, and track their progress.

faqs.question: Can I try out the service before subscribing?
faqs.answer: We offer a demo video that showcases how our service works. Simply fill out the form and select "Free Demo" as the topic to receive the video. Additionally, you can book a call with us to have a sales representative answer any questions you may have.

corevalues.title: Customer Centric
corevalues.description: Our customers are central to everything we do. We are dedicated to understanding and meeting their needs, creating digital products that provide genuine value. By prioritizing customer satisfaction, we build strong relationships and ensure our solutions align with their goals.

corevalues.title: Innovation
corevalues.description: At Kolm, we harness creativity and cutting-edge technology to deliver impactful digital solutions. Our innovative approach ensures your business excels in the fast-paced online world, distinguishing you from the competition. We believe innovation is the only path to continued performance, growth and scale.

corevalues.title: Positive encouragement
corevalues.description: We value teamwork and open communication, striving to make working with us the highlight of your day. We believe in uplifting one another and, through close collaboration, gaining a deep understanding of your brand and objectives. This allows us to create tailored digital solutions that drive real results by combining our expertise with your insights.

aboutcompanies.title: An open letter from our founder: Welcome to a new digital age
aboutcompanies.description:
At Rnd we believe in reimagening the digital world to empower businesses like yours to thrive online. In todayâs fast-paced world, especially with the emergence of AI, we understand the challenges you face in navigating the complexities of the online world while striving to stand out amidst fierce competition.

Our mission is simple yet powerful: to revolutionize the way businesses manage their design and website needs through our innovative subscription-based model, offering unlimited design services and comprehensive website packages.

Our approach is built on three fundamental pillars:

Tailored solutions: We understand that no two businesses are alike. Thatâs why we take the time to understand your brand, your objectives, and your target audience to deliver customized design solutions that resonate with your industry and drive real results.

Collaborative partnership: We believe in the power of collaboration. Our team of design and development experts works hand-in-hand with you every step of the way, ensuring that your vision is brought to life.

Ongoing support: Your success is our success. From the initial consultation to project delivery and beyond, weâre here to provide ongoing support and guidance to help you achieve your digital goals.

At Rnd, weâre not just another digital agency; weâre your dedicated ally in the ever-evolving digital landscape. We look forward to embarking on this journey together and helping your business grow to new heights.

Warm regards,

Olico Matsjitadze-Turco

CEO and Founder

contents.heading: Subscription-based web solutions
contents.description: Our subscription model offers a sustainable solution for businesses to regularly update design assets and meet market expectations. Our approach maximizes design efficiency and reliability, blending high-quality creativity with productivity in a tech-driven era.

questions.question: Fast & consistent delivery
questions.answer:
Our collaborative platform streamlines project management, making it highly efficient. You have the flexibility to add multiple design requests to your board. Our designers will deliver them one-by-one.

 

You can easily track the progress, provide feedback, and include any additional information that will assist the designer. Depending on the complexity, designs will be delivered within 1-3 days, ensuring the timely completion of your projects.

questions.question: Cost-effective
questions.answer: Hiring a team of designers, developers, and social media experts can be expensive. Additionally, it can be challenging to find reliable experts. With our subscription plans, you can get access to all these services at a fraction of the cost of hiring your own team.

questions.question: Flexible subscriptions
questions.answer:
We offer flexible subscriptions which means you can cancel or pause your subscription every month. If you find your business with a lighter workload, you have the option to temporarily pause your subscription.

 

You can reactivate it at any time and utilize the remaining duration of your subscription. These options are easily accessible within your account settings.

questions.question: High-quality custom work
questions.answer:
In today's market, regularly refreshing and updating creative assets and websites is essential to maintain a competitive edge. Our custom designs are specifically crafted to make you stand out from the crowd.

Not only do we create visually appealing designs, but we also implement business incentives, such as lead generation strategies, to optimize your assets. With our services, you'll have easy access to a pool of top-notch designers, right at your fingertips

questions.question: Time constrains
questions.answer: Managing design and digital assets can be time-consuming, diverting resources from core activities. Working with multiple freelancers or agencies for design and digital management can worsen time constraints, leading to communication issues and project delays

questions.question: Financial constraints for long-term agency commitment
questions.answer: Businesses often face financial challenges that prevent them from committing to long-term partnerships with design agencies. While recognizing the value of external design support, they may find it difficult to sustain financial commitments over an extended period.

questions.question: Difficulty finding good design talent
questions.answer: Businesses face challenges in finding and retaining skilled design talent. The shortage of qualified designers may hinder their ability to fulfill design needs effectively

questions.question: Limited resources to meet design demand
questions.answer: Limited resources, including budget, time, and personnel, may hinder businesses' ability to effectively manage design and digital assets in-house or through various channels

questions.question: Lack of expertise
questions.answer: The rapidly evolving digital landscape presents challenges in keeping up with emerging trends, technologies, and platforms. Business owners or internal teams may lack the expertise or specialized skills required to execute design and development tasks effectively, leading to me

servicedetails.heading: Crafting digital experiences beyond websites.
servicedetails.description: Stand out from the competition with our unique designs and user-centric web solutions, ensuring a captivating user experience that WOWS your audience and drives conversions.

questions.question: Build a new Website
questions.answer: Transform your online presence with our specialized expertise. We will create a stunning, custom website tailored to your business needs, helping your brand stand out in the digital landscape.

questions.question: Improve an existing Website
questions.answer: Elevate your current website to new heights. Our team will analyze, optimize, and re-design your existing website, ensuring it delivers an exceptional user experience and drives tangible results for your business.

servicedetails.heading: Web Solutions for Businesses
servicedetails.description: We offer customized CMS solutions that align with your brand identity and provide a user-friendly experience.

questions.question: Support after product development
questions.answer: As part of our package, we provide a comprehensive off-boarding process, including personalized 1-on-1 training, to ensure you have the skills and confidence to effectively manage your website. Additionally, we offer website management services as an optional extra, taking care of maintenance, bug fixes, and enhancements, so you can focus on your business while we handle the technical aspects.

questions.question: Seamless integration
questions.answer: We offer customized CMS solutions that align with your brand identity and provide a user-friendly experience. Our expertise extends to seamlessly connecting these CMS solutions to your preferred marketing and CRM platforms, empowering you to streamline workflows and nurture customer relationships effectively.

servicedetails.heading: High-end design is the new norm for businesses.
servicedetails.description:
An increasing number of businesses are recognizing the value of significant investment in high-quality, professional design. In todayâs competitive market, a well-designed brand is vital for standing out, attracting and retaining customers, and communicating messages effectively.

High-end design not only improves user experience and a strong first impression but also builds customer trust. This solid foundation paves the way for substantial business growth, making great design not just an aesthetic choice, but a proven business strategy.

questions.question: Our Solution
questions.answer: By subscribing to our service, you gain continuous access to our top-quality design solutions. Our all-inclusive subscription service eliminates the need to hire multiple freelancers or coordinate with various agencies. We expertly manage your design requirements, from the initial stages to finalization, enabling you to primarily focus on your core business activities.

questions.question: Our all-in-one platform
questions.answer: Joining our services is simple and quick. Once you subscribe on our website, you'll be ready to start within just 1-3 days. Our all-in-one platform caters to all your needs, providing an easy way to manage requests, organize files, and communicate with your designers, all in one place. Our integrated platform not only simplifies your workflow by eliminating the need for multiple tools, but it also facilitates easier and more efficient collaboration with your designer.

servicedetails.heading: Improve your content game

The social media landscape is witnessing an upsurge in content with high production quality, increased use of animated concepts, and a general improvement in overall production standards.

In todayâs digital age, if you aim to compete with the top industry leaders, your social media presence is more important than ever. Our service can help you do that. It not only improves your social credibility, but also helps you build an active community that rallies around your unique brand. Donât miss out, start building your social media credit now!

servicedetails.heading: Where the digital journey begins

A websiteâs completion is just the start of its digital journey, not the finish line. Our dedicated website maintenance and management services provide the necessary, ongoing enhancements and adaptations that keep your online business competitive, efficient, and always in sync with the dynamic digital landscape.

Consider our team of developers and designers as an extension of your own team, where we collaborate seamlessly to create assets for your website.

servicedetails.heading: Fast onboarding: start using our service in no time
servicedetails.description: Once you complete the payment process, you will receive an email within 24 hours containing your account details, including your login credentials and instructions on how to access your personal portal. You can start using the service right away by logging into your personal portal.

questions.question: All-in-one collaborative platform
questions.answer: Our all-in-one solution has been developed with the aim of streamlining the collaborative process by providing a centralized platform. This platform enables you to easily manage requests, organize files, integrate with existing workflows, and communicate with your designers, all within a single location. By consolidating these key functionalities, our solution eliminates the need for multiple tools and disparate communication channels.

questions.question: Integrated with Trello and Slack
questions.answer:
For the convenience of design requests, we utilize Trello as our designated platform. Through Trello, you have the ability to submit and track your design requests effectively.

 

In terms of communication, we employ Slack as our preferred tool for seamless interaction between our designers and clients. With Slack, you can engage in real-time discussions, exchange valuable feedback, and maintain a transparent and efficient line of communication throughout the design process.

servicedetails.heading: Add unlimited requests
servicedetails.description: Easily manage your design projects with our convenient portal. Provide important details like design briefs and backlogs, and add an unlimited number of design requests. Our talented designers will promptly get to work on fulfilling your requests, all while enjoying the ease and efficiency of managing your projects in one place.

questions.question: Prioritize your requests in your queue
questions.answer:
For optimal prioritization, we recommend placing important tasks at the forefront within your Trello board. This ensures a focused approach as tasks are addressed one-by-one.

 

You have the flexibility to add as many design requests as you wish. Once a task is completed and approved by the client, it will be moved from the "In Progress" column to the "Approved" column, providing a clear visual indication of progress.

questions.question: Unlimited revisions
questions.answer: We provide a 100% satisfaction guarantee, ensuring unlimited revisions to meet your expectations. Our utmost priority is to ensure that our clients are completely satisfied with our solutions. We strive to go above and beyond to deliver results that exceed your expectations and leave you fully happy with our services.

servicedetails.heading: Download assets & repeat the process
servicedetails.description: Our process involves handling your requests one-at-a-time, ensuring that each design is given the attention it deserves. Youâll have the convenience of downloading your assets directly from our portal.

questions.question: File formats
questions.answer: We offer a range of file formats, including PNG, JPEG, and SVGs, to accommodate your specific needs. In addition, we provide files that are compatible with Canva, allowing for seamless integration into your preferred design platform.

questions.question: Pause or cancel subscription
questions.answer: If you find your business with a lighter workload, you have the option to temporarily pause your subscription. You can reactivate it at any time and utilize the remaining duration of your subscription. Additionally, cancellation is available on a monthly basis, depending on the terms of your subscription. These options are easily accessible within your account settings

servicedetails.heading: What is Rnd ?
servicedetails.description: Kolm is a design agency that offers both unlimited subscription-based design services and one-time website packages, tailored to meet the diverse needs of modern businesses. Our mission is to deliver high-quality, reliable, and efficient design solutions that empower your brand to thrive in a competitive market.

questions.question: Website packages
questions.answer:
For businesses looking to modernize their website with a tailored solution, our one-time website packages are ideal. Here's how it works:

Select a package: Choose a website package that meets your specific requirements on our website. Our transparent pricing ensures there are no surprises.

questions.question: Our subscription models

banners.title: Privacy Policy
banners.details:
Effective date: May 5, 2024

This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You.

We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

banners.title: Interpretation and Definitions
banners.details:
Interpretation

The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions.

The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.

banners.title: Definitions
banners.details:
For the purposes of this Privacy Policy:

  • You means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable.Under GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation), You can be referred to as the Data Subject or as the User as you are the individual using the Service.
  • Company (referred to as either âthe Companyâ, âWeâ, âUsâ or âOurâ in this Agreement) refers to Kolm Design, Dagvlinderstraat 14, 5641 BG.For the purpose of the GDPR, the Company is the Data Controller.
  • Affiliate means an entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party, where âcontrolâ means ownership of 50% or more of the shares, equity interest or other securities entitled to vote for election of directors or other managing authority.
  • Account means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service.
  • Website refers to Kolm Design, accessible from https://kolmdesign.com
  • Service refers to the Website.
  • Country refers to: Noord-Brabant, Netherlands
  • Service Provider means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company. It refers to third-party companies or individuals employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used.For the purpose of the GDPR, Service Providers are considered Data Processors.
  • Third-party Social Media Service refers to any website or any social network website through which a User can log in or create an account to use the Service.
  • Personal Data is any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual.For the purposes for GDPR, Personal Data means any information relating to You such as a name, an identification number, location data, online identifier or to one or more factors specific to the physical, physiological, genetic, mental, economic, cultural or social identity.
  • For the purposes of the CCPA, Personal Data means any information that identifies, relates to, describes or is capable of being associated with, or could reasonably be linked, directly or indirectly, with You.
  • Cookies are small files that are placed on Your computer, mobile device or any other device by a website, containing the details of Your browsing history on that website among its many uses.
  • Device means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cellphone or a digital tablet.
  • Usage Data refers to data collected automatically, either generated by the use of the Service or from the Service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit).
  • Data Controller, for the purposes of the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation), refers to the Company as the legal person which alone or jointly with others determines the purposes and means of the processing of Personal Data.
  • Business, for the purpose of the CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act), refers to the Company as the legal entity that collects Consumersâ personal information and determines the purposes and means of the processing of Consumersâ personal information, or on behalf of which such information is collected and that alone, or jointly with others, determines the purposes and means of the processing of consumersâ personal information, that does business in the State of California.
  • Consumer, for the purpose of the CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act), means a natural person who is a California resident. A resident, as defined in the law, includes (1) every individual who is in the USA for other than a temporary or transitory purpose, and (2) every individual who is domiciled in the USA who is outside the USA for a temporary or transitory purpose.
  • Sale, for the purpose of the CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act), means selling, renting, releasing, disclosing, disseminating, making available, transferring, or otherwise communicating orally, in writing, or by electronic or other means, a Consumerâs personal information to another business or a third party for monetary or other valuable consideration.

banners.title: Usage Data
banners.details:
Usage Data is collected automatically when using the Service.

Usage Data may include information such as Your Deviceâs Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that You visit, the time and date of Your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.

When You access the Service by or through a mobile device, We may collect certain information automatically, including, but not limited to, the type of mobile device You use, Your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of Your mobile device, Your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browser You use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.

We may also collect information that Your browser sends whenever You visit our Service or when You access the Service by or through a mobile device.

banners.title: Terms & Conditions
banners.details:
Last updated: May 5, 2024

Please read these Terms of Use (âTermsâ, âTerms of Useâ) carefully before using the https://kolmdesign.com website (the âServiceâ) operated by Kolm Design (âusâ, âweâ, or âourâ).

Your access to and use of the Service is conditioned on your acceptance of and compliance with these Terms. These Terms apply to all visitors, users and others who access or use the Service.

By accessing or using the Service you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms then you may not access the Service.

banners.title: Accounts
banners.details: When you create an account with us, you must provide us information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms, which may result in immediate termination of your account on our Service. You are responsible for safeguarding the password that you use to access the Service and for any activities or actions under your password, whether your password is with our Service or a third-party service. You agree not to disclose your password to any third party. You must notify us immediately upon becoming aware of any breach of security or unauthorized use of your account.

banners.title: Termination
banners.details: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease. If you wish to terminate your account, you may simply discontinue using the Service. All provisions of the Terms which by their nature should survive termination shall survive termination, including, without limitation, ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, indemnity and limitations of liability.

banners.title: Disclaimer
banners.details: Your use of the Service is at your sole risk. The Service is provided on an âAS ISâ and âAS AVAILABLEâ basis. The Service is provided without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied, including, but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, non-infringement or course of performance.

banners.title: Cookie Policy
banners.details: This is the Cookie Policy for Kolm Design, accessible from https://kolmdesign.com/

banners.title: What Are Cookies
banners.details: As is common practice with almost all professional websites this site uses cookies, which are tiny files that are downloaded to your computer, to improve your experience. This page describes what information they gather, how we use it and why we sometimes need to store these cookies. We will also share how you can prevent these cookies from being stored however this may downgrade or âbreakâ certain elements of the sites functionality.

banners.title: The Cookies We Set
banners.details:
• Account related cookiesIf you create an account with us then we will use cookies for the management of the signup process and general administration. These cookies will usually be deleted when you log out however in some cases they may remain afterwards to remember your site preferences when logged out.
  • Login related cookiesWe use cookies when you are logged in so that we can remember this fact. This prevents you from having to log in every single time you visit a new page. These cookies are typically removed or cleared when you log out to ensure that you can only access restricted features and areas when logged in.
  • Email newsletters related cookiesThis site offers newsletter or email subscription services and cookies may be used to remember if you are already registered and whether to show certain notifications which might only be valid to subscribed/unsubscribed users.
  • Orders processing related cookiesThis site offers e-commerce or payment facilities and some cookies are essential to ensure that your order is remembered between pages so that we can process it properly.
  • Forms related cookiesWhen you submit data to through a form such as those found on contact pages or comment forms cookies may be set to remember your user details for future correspondence.
  • Site preferences cookiesIn order to provide you with a great experience on this site we provide the functionality to set your preferences for how this site runs when you use it. In order to remember your preferences we need to set cookies so that this information can be called whenever you interact with a page is affected by your preferences.

banners.title: Third Party Cookies
banners.details:
In some special cases we also use cookies provided by trusted third parties. The following section details which third party cookies you might encounter through this site.

  • This site uses Google Analytics which is one of the most widespread and trusted analytics solution on the web for helping us to understand how you use the site and ways that we can improve your experience. These cookies may track things such as how long you spend on the site and the pages that you visit so we can continue to produce engaging content.For more information on Google Analytics cookies, see the official Google Analytics page.
  • From time to time we test new features and make subtle changes to the way that the site is delivered. When we are still testing new features these cookies may be used to ensure that you receive a consistent experience whilst on the site whilst ensuring we understand which optimisations our users appreciate the most.
  • As we sell products itâs important for us to understand statistics about how many of the visitors to our site actually make a purchase and as such this is the kind of data that these cookies will track. This is important to you as it means that we can accurately make business predictions that allow us to monitor our advertising and product costs to ensure the best possible price.
  • The Google AdSense service we use to serve advertising uses a DoubleClick cookie to serve more relevant ads across the web and limit the number of times that a given ad is shown to you.For more information on Google AdSense see the official Google AdSense privacy FAQ.
  • We also use social media buttons and/or plugins on this site that allow you to connect with your social network in various ways. For these to work the following social media sites including; {List the social networks whose features you have integrated with your site?:12}, will set cookies through our site which may be used to enhance your profile on their site or contribute to the data they hold for various purposes outlined in their respective privacy policies.

paragraph.text: If you can imagine it, we can create it. We offer web development and design services through subscription-based plans and packages.

homeanimations.title: The flexibility you need
homeanimations.subtitle: Choose a subscription plan or package
homeanimations.description: Our subscription plans offer the flexibility you need to scale your business at your own pace. Whether you're looking for a monthly or annual subscription, we've got you covered with a variety of options to suit your business needs. We also offer website packages.

homeanimations.title: Manage projects easily
homeanimations.subtitle: Creative management platform
iconTitle: Design collaboration via text, video on platform
homeanimations.paragraph: Our all-in-one solution is designed to simplify the creative process by offering a centralized platform. With our platform, you can manage requests, files, integrate with existing workflows, and communicate with your designers, all in one place.
homeanimations.author: Olico, Co-founder & CEO at Kolm.

homeanimations.title: Always stay up-to-date
homeanimations.subtitle: Unlimited requests in your portal
iconTitle: High quality designs that meet your business objectives
Prioritize your creative queue, by adding the important tasks on top of your list
Receive designs within 1-2 days depending on the complexity
homeanimations.paragraph: Add an unlimited number of requests to your portal, giving you the flexibility to manage your tasks according to your unique needs. You can easily view all active, queued, and completed tasks, ensuring that you're always up-to-date on the status of your projects.
homeanimations.author: Olico, Co-founder & CEO at Kolm.

homeanimations.title: Flexibility in every decision
homeanimations.subtitle: No strings attached
iconTitle: Budget effortlessly with our fixed monthly rate, no extra fees
Pause or cancel anytime with our flexible subscription
Start your project now, avoiding delays from lengthy negotiations or contracts
homeanimations.paragraph: Our service offers a fixed monthly rate with no commitments, so you can get started on your project right away. Say goodbye to surprises and negotiations - our month-to-month collaborations allow you to pause or cancel anytime based on your needs.
homeanimations.author: Olico, Co-founder & CEO at Kolm.

homeanimations.title: Manage projects easily
homeanimations.subtitle: Choose a subscription plan or package
homeanimations.author: Olico, Co-founder & CEO at Kolm.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Professional design team
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Gain access to a dedicated team of skilled designers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Top-tier visuals
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We consistently provide top-quality visuals with a fast turnaround time of 24-48 hours, depending on complexity with unlimited revisions.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Across all platforms
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We prioritize maintaining a strong and cohesive brand identity across all platforms.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Pause or cancel anytime
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Enjoy the flexibility to pause or cancel our design subscription anytime, ensuring control over your design expenses.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Flat monthly fee structure
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Our flat monthly fee structure offers a cost-effective alternative to hiring in-house designers or engaging multiple freelancers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Adapt to changing business needs
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Easily adapt to changing business needs while maintaining control over your design expenses.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Customized subscription plans
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Tailor your design subscription package to your needs. Receive 1, 2, 3, or more design assets at a time without a linear increase in costs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: No surprises, just reliable support
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Enjoy customized retainer plans for ongoing design support at fixed costs. Plan and manage your budgets effectively without unexpected expenses.

questionsAndAnswers.question: On-demand support without the overhead
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Access on-demand design services during peak times or surges in demand without hiring permanent employees. Avoid recruitment costs, employee benefits, and potential downsizing expenses associated with permanent hires or freelancers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Strategic design
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Our specialized work processes are optimized for success. With a proven track record of delivering results for numerous clients, we offer tangible evidence that our designs drive business success.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Peace of Mind
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Our team takes care of the creative aspects, providing you with peace of mind and more time to drive growth and innovation for your business.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Commitment to Success
questionsAndAnswers.answer: At Kolm, our team is deeply committed and passionate about design, driven by our dedication to excellence, ensuring your brand's continuous growth and success.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Real-time Communication
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Through our portal, you can utilize efficient communication tools for direct communication with our design team.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Real-time progress tracking
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Track project progress in real-time, allowing for efficient project management and quick turnaround times.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Efficient project management
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Our user-friendly platform enables seamless collaboration, making it easy to submit requests and provide feedback.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Beyond Design
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Alongside our design subscriptions, we provide options for social media management, website management, or both, ensuring all your digital needs are covered under one roof.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Integrated Approach
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Our integrated approach with Kolm subscription services centralizes design, social media, and website management, offering all these services under one roof. This streamlines communication and decision-making, saving you time, reducing complexity, and boosting efficiency in managing your digital assets and campaigns.

pageheadings.heading: All packages
pageheadings.subheading: Choose the package* that fits your business needs. Our custom-made websites are built using WordPress. Each package requires a one-time payment, covering all included features + services.

pageheadings.heading: About Us
pageheadings.subheading: We offer unlimited design solutions and customized website packages

pageheadings.heading: Our Values
pageheadings.subheading: At Kolm, our core values drive everything we do. They shape our approach to business, guide our interactions with clients, and underpin our commitment to delivering exceptional digital solutions. Here are the values that define us:
